announcement.title_zh: 关于PokerFi星球正式开启候选矿池申请的公告
announcement.title_en: Announcement on PokerFi Planet Officially Opening Application for Candidate Mining Pools
list_zh: PokerFi星球作为OASIS绿洲元宇宙的首个创世星球，自诞生以来，始终在进行更高维度的进化，在即将到来的PokerFi进化奇点，PokerFi星球的整个生态经济模型将迎来再一次伟大跃迁。
在本次的PokerFi星球的进化跃迁 中，PokerFi的生态模型将衍生出全新的”高维物种“——矿池, 它在实现整个PokerFi社区拓展架构升级的同时，将真正承载现实BTC生态经济模型中矿池、矿机生产商甚至价值共识者培育的核心职能。关于“矿池“生态模型的具体阐述已正式发布给全球各大社区，所有玩家可以通过社区详细了解。
在当前PokerFi进化阶段成为矿池的唯一方式：申请成为候选矿池，届时将直接晋级为正式矿池。具体规则如下：
候选矿池开放申请时间：
1. 矿场算力达到15万及以上；
2. 质押10000枚PK币至官方公布的统一地址：
待成为正式矿池后，10000枚PK原路退回；
候选矿池审核通过后，获得以下权益：
1. 获得阶段性的PK币空投奖励，具体见后续公告；
2. 可直接晋级正式矿池，享有正式矿池权益
list_en: PokerFi planet is the first creation planet of the OASIS metaverse. PokerFi has always been evolving in higher dimensions since its birth. At the upcoming PokerFi evolution singularity, the entire ecological economic model of the PokerFi planet will jump in another great leap.

In this evolutionary transition of the PokerFi planet, PokerFi's ecological model will derive a new high-dimensional species, the Mining Pool. The Mining Pool will carry the functions of mining pools, mining machine manufacturers and educating the value consensus users in the BTC ecological economic model in reality, while realizing the expansion and upgrading of the entire PokerFi community. The detailed description of the Mining Pool ecological model has been officially released to major worldwide communities. All players can learn more about it through the community.
The only way to become a mining pool in the PokerFi:
Firstly, apply to become a candidate mining pool. Then it will be directly promoted to an official mining pool. The specific rules are as follows:
1. The mining power reaches 150,000 and above.
2. Stake 10,000 PK tokens to the unified official address: 0x2FeFe3101e912fA81F06F37C0B58e05c1C718aA8

Once the candidate pool audit has been approved, the following benefits are obtained:
1. Get a phased PK coin airdrop reward, see the follow-up announcement;
2. Can directly advance to the official mine pool, enjoy the rights and interests of the formal mine pool.
